blue berry.description: A blue berry. It restores 1/2 a food point. It grows only on bushes

hot blue berry.description: A blue berry but it's hot. It restores 1/2 a food point and will burn your mouth.

blue berry seed.description: A seed used to plant blue berry bushes

red berry.description: A red berry. It restores 1/2 a food point. It grows only on bushes

hot red berry.description: A red berry but it's hot. It restores 1/2 a food point and will burn your mouth.

red berry seed.description: A seed used to plant red berry bushes

purple berry.description: A purple berry. It restores 1/2 a food point. It grows only on bushes

hot purple berry.description: A purple berry but it's hot. It restores 1/2 a food point and will burn your mouth.

purple berry seed.description: A seed used to plant purple berry bushes

berry salad.description: A mix of many different types of berries. Restores 2.5 food points.

apple.description: A juicy apple. It restores 1/2 a food point. It only grows on trees

baked apple.description: A squishier hotter apple. It's more filling than normal and restores a food point.

apple seed.description: A seed used to plant apple trees

pear.description: A juicy pear. It restores a food point. It only grows on trees

baked pear.description: An even squishier hotter pear. It's more filling than normal and restores a food point.

pear seed.description: A seed used to plant pear trees

orange.description: An orange. It restores a food point. It only grows on trees

burnt orange.description: An orange that's been burnt until it turned black. It tastes gross and restores only 0.1 food point.

orange seed.description: A seed used to plant orange trees

fruit salad.description: A mix of many different types of fruits. Restores 2.5 food points.

fruit smoothie.description: A liquid mix of many different types of fruits and berries. It's very healthy and it restores 6 food points.

sapling.description: A sapling used to plant trees

iron ore.description: It's a uncooked piece of iron

steel.description: It's strong piece of metal made from Iron Ore

wheat.description: A plant that's useful for making foods

wheat seeds.description: A seed used to plant wheat

watermelon.description: A big juicy unsliced watermelon. Only edible when sliced.

sliced watermelon.description: A juicy slice of watermelon. Restores 3 food points.

melon seeds.description: A seed used to plant watermelon

pumpkin seeds.description: A seed used to plant pumpkins

smelter.description: Used to melt minerals and other things

plug.description: Used to transfer electricity from your house to an appliance

wooden hatchet.description: A tool you can use to mine rock

stone hatchet.description: A tool you can use to mine rock and other minerals

stone knife.description: Used to carve wood into shapes

hacksaw.description: Used to carve and cut into steel

wheel.description: A way to move things. Doesn't last long

seat.description: Used so you can sit on a thing

unicycle.description: Use so you can travel up to 5 steps in style

bicycle.description: Use so you can travel up to 10 steps in style

car.description: Use so you can travel up to 25 steps in style

ladder.description: Used to travel above places. Place it so that it touches the top of your location to explore upwards.

donation basket.description: Used to donate items to other players
